text: NEW YORK, NY - FEBRUARY 13 : Tyga and Kylie Jenner attend the Front Row for the Philipp Plein Fall / Winter 2017 / 2018 Women's And Men's Fashion Show at The New York Public Library on February 13, 2017 in New York City.
